page.title: 07Holiday Accommodation
page.content: This block is very popular with tourists. The estates at Achahoish and Ormsary both have a variety of self_catering accommodation to let all the year round. On Ellary estate (the Achahoish end of the block), there are 4 purpose_built wooden chalets and several traditional cottages to let. At Ormsary, there are 13 chalets and a few traditional cottages as well. All holiday accommodation is fully equipped. The people who come on holiday here have many things to do. They can go hill_walking, boating, wind_surfing, fishing or cycling, or they can look at the wildlife, or visit the other attractions in the vicinity of the block. The sandy beaches and shallow water make it an ideal spot for families with young children.
